title: 面包菌的标志墙
content:
[!--
====
这里面现在全是logo。苦逼乙方面包的生存之道。
====
====
--]

[[module css]]
@import url(https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/breaddddd2/code/1);

div.gallery-box {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(min(calc(7.5rem), 100%), 1fr));
    gap: 1em;
    justify-content: center;
    width: max-content;
    margin: 1em auto;
    overflow: unset;
}

div.gallery-item[class] {
    border: none;
    margin: auto;
    padding: 0.25em;
    width: max-content;
    height: max-content;
}

div.gallery-item :where(table, tbody, tr, td) {
    display: contents;
}

div.gallery-box a {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    width: 7.5rem;
    height: 7.5rem;
    background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
    border: 0.1rem rgb(225, 225, 225) solid;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    margin: auto;
    outline: 0 rgb(187, 0, 17) solid;
    transition: all 125ms linear;
}

div.gallery-box a:where(:hover, :focus) {
    outline-width: 0.2rem;
    transform: scale(1.5);
}
[[/module]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=image http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/breaddddd/breadlogo.png]]
[[=]]
+ [[[breaddddd-art-2-2|To GoI、设定、aic相关标志]]]
[[/=]]
----
**观前提示：**
* 由于logo太多了，所以拆分了logo艺作页
* 这里主要是MTF、基金会设施、单独的文档相关logo
* MTF转正之后理论上可以来找我做logo

[[collapsible show="◢Site-CN-34相关logo" hide="关闭"]]

author: breaddddd
